requirement: This code is intended to implement a control mechanism for enabling and monitoring the power status of three servo motor axes (X, Y, Z) with error handling functionality.
provide_code:
FUNCTION_BLOCK FB_TripleAxisPower
VAR_INPUT
	AxisX			:	SM3_Basic.AXIS_REF_SM3			//X轴引用
	AxisY			:	SM3_Basic.AXIS_REF_SM3			//Y轴引用
	AxisZ			:	SM3_Basic.AXIS_REF_SM3			//Z轴引用
	bServoEnable	:	BOOL;				//伺服使能信号
END_VAR
VAR_OUTPUT
	bReady			:	BOOL;				//三轴都准备就绪
	bAxisXReady		:	BOOL;				//X轴准备就绪
	bAxisYReady		:	BOOL;				//Y轴准备就绪
	bAxisZReady		:	BOOL;				//Z轴准备就绪
	bError			:	BOOL;				//错误标志
	sErrorString	:	STRING;				//错误信息字符串
END_VAR
